attributes.action: Give the British voter a voice, and allow a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty as promised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some time ago, the PM promised the British voter a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty, and so far has failed to deliver. We would now like that vote and petition the PM to allow it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
